name: Police Car Parking Adventure
description:
Police Car Parking 3D is a 3D parking simulator game. Test your parking skills and get better driver in real life with this excellent driving experience.

Chasing down the most wanted outlaws in your cop car is one thing you need to do as a cop. As a police officer it’s your task to chase down those wanted criminals over the cities highways and to make them pay for their crimes . But at the end of every duty you need to park your police car at the police station and end your shift. As you will notice in this wonderful 3D parking game, is that parking your car can be tricky and hard to do. Especially if you need to drive your police car through special designed levels and parking challenges that will push you till the limit of your patience.

How to Play

- Use steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedals to control the car.
- Get to the parking pit before the time runs out.
- Do not hit anywhere!
